body:
I'm in a hurry for prestige I'm close  and most the time i don't get points because they keep logging off before they die or fall out the world in nebula i can't report cause i don't pay any attention to peoples usernames when i pvp 
I really hate it... it needs to stop... Dx stop it people just stop I'm impatient for prestige

replies.body:
"it's just an open opinion not spam if it was spam there would be another thread saying the same thing over and over again  sending the same message over and over"
I think you are misinterpreting the usage of the word spam. Spam isn't always just repeating things over and over,it can mean "junk" or basically something useless.

"besides isn't it a hint for someone to fix this problem jeez.. it can produce discussion if we are discussing now and now that i said that" 
If you're intentions were to find a solution the problem you should have stated it as so. Initially you said that, "I really hate it... it needs to stop... Dx stop it people just stop I'm impatient for prestige", which hints that the only reason you created this thread was to make it easier for you to prestige.    

"you don't have to talk in this thread if you don't like this topic or even post why does it bother you so?"       
It bothers me because it is just useless junk that clutters the forums.
